<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lie Detector](/Feats.aspx?ID=5948) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 108 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[empiricism](/Methodologies.aspx?ID=5) or [interrogation](/Methodologies.aspx?ID=8) methodology

</column>

---

You're adept at noticing the tells of a liar—sweat, flushing, a quavering voice, a quickening pulse. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=2302) and to Perception DCs against attempts to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=2389) to you. When you determine someone is lying to you, you can use their deceit to your advantage to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the next [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39), [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40), or [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) check you attempt against that creature within the next minute.

 If you would gain your [Pursue a Lead](/Actions.aspx?ID=2811) investigation bonus to any of the above checks, that bonus increases by 1 instead of you gaining the +1 bonus listed.
name: Lie Detector
